column4: anyone know what this means? 'checking for XML::Parser... configure: error: XML::Parser perl module is required for intltool'
that you have to install XML::Parser?  :)
- i couldnt find it with synaptic
- what's CPAN? I'm trying to install Serpentine 0.7
it's THE repository for perl modules    http://search.cpan.org/~msergeant/XML-Parser-2.34/Parser.pm
go to cpan.org and read up.
- so now I have to install that thing first?
ask in #perl for any help installing perl modules
- nah, i'll wait for the ubuntu team to update serpentine
that module might be in libxml-parser-perl package. not sure how to tell
great  :)    if you ever get into perl heavily, check out cpan ;)
